data.text:
[Remerciement : Entrepreneurship Talk ] 

Un chaleureux remerciement à nos panelistes exceptionnels : Mme.Salsabil Thabti, M.Mohamed khedher, M.Med Khaled Mezghanni, Mme.Chaima Torkhani et Mme.Yosra Hamli qui ont participé à l'Entrepreneurship Talk lors de l'ISG JOB FAIR 3.0. 
Votre présence a apporté une perspective unique sur le monde de l'entrepreneuriat, inspirant et éduquant nos étudiants.
Votre partage d'expériences et de conseils pratiques a été d'une valeur inestimable pour tous ceux présents. 
Nous sommes profondément reconnaissants pour votre contribution à faire de l'Entrepreneurship Talk un moment captivant et instructif. 
Votre engagement envers l'innovation et le leadership entrepreneurial a laissé une empreinte précieuse sur nos participants.

#SMA_JE
#ISG_Job_Fair
#unlockyourcareer

Les entrepreneurs tunisiens intéressés par le marché algérien !


Lors de mon passage à l'événement Smau organiser à Milan - Italy

J'ai eu le plaisir de rencontrer des vingtaines d'entrepreneurs ambitieux, des investisseurs et des VC's, et avoir une idée sur l'écosystème italien qui est en plein mouvement et croissance.

J'ai eu aussi l'occasion de rencontrer nos voisins marocains et tunisiens.

Plusieurs entrepreneurs tunisiens m'ont informé qu'ils veulent pénétrer le marché algérien, dont Mohamed khedher qui a un projet ambitieux et intéressant à la fois.

Ils m'ont tous posé la même question : est-ce que les startups tunisiennes peuvent être financées en Algérie ?

Algerian Startup Fund une opportunité pour les entrepreneurs tunisiens ? est ce que c'est faisable ?

Ps : j'ai profité de faire la promotion de notre pays ainsi que notre écosystème, et de matcher des founders algériens avec d'autres founders pour des collaborations.

Ps2 : Je vais commencer à faire du sport la semaine prochaine, je dis ça depuis une année :)

The more it is, the more there is. Innovation is a cyclical process of progress that is continuously reinventing itself. Thank you, Mo Islam, for granting me the platform to share my insights in the hopes that I inspire upcoming innovators to believe in their dreams.

كلّما كان الابتكار حاضراً، كلّما كان هناك المزيد من الأفكار. فالابتكار هو عملية دورية مستدامة للتطوّر، تُعيد ابتكار نفسها باستمرار. يسرني أن أشكر  صديقي محمد على الفرصة الرائعة عبر استضافتي على هذه المنصة لمشاركة رؤيتي في هذا المجال، على أمل أن تكون هذه الرؤية مُلهمة للمبتكرين في المستقبل للتمسك بأحلامهم والإيمان بها.

#astratech #moshow #innovation

I had the great privilege of animating a Metaverse workshop in collaboration with Junior Enterprises Tunisia - JET this past weekend. The session was divided into two parts: an introduction to the Metaverse and web3.0 followed by a hands-on ideation and pitching workshop. I was absolutely blown away by the incredible amount of creativity and ingenuity displayed by the participants. It's clear that the future of web3.0 is in great hands with this amazing group of young talents. 

Thank you Nour Cherif for the invitation. Keep up the fantastic work you are doing, leading the events division.
Unfortunately, Med Arbi SOUALHIA from Red Fish XR Studio couldn't join me to co-animate this session due to some health issues :/

#metaverse #web3 #workshop

8 Ways AI will power the #Metaverse.  With #ai, deep learning-based software will autonomously drive all activities, and chatbots and other forms of natural language processing will drive interactions. AI will be used to understand words, images, video and text — in every language. This all requires a massive amount of training data and modeling.  So how exactly will AI improve the Metaverse?

1. AI-powered operations (AIOps)
To keep platforms robust, always on, and scalable is very demanding. AIOps can be used to predict and prevent outages, identify problems in real-time, and optimize resources. 

2. AI bots can be used for a variety of tasks, including customer service, marketing, and sales and monitor in-world activity, like prevent abuse and hate speech

3. Avatars:  AI can help generate realistic avatars and use natural language processing to create realistic dialogue 

4. Digital twins: AI can scan real life objects and develop them in MV spaces to be shared and scaled for prototypes, and run simulations 

5. Data: AI can analyze customer data, demographics and deliver custom experiences and recommendations, monitor speech, moderate groups, promote goods and services

6. Generate images:  Virtual worlds can be created via text to image, or 2D drawing to 3D 

7. Guides: What is the google of the Metaverse?  It will likely be so complex that only AI will be able to navigate the data to deliver us to the experiences we seek.

8. Trading:  AI can ensure that various actions, such as trading, are executed according to the determined agreements and record keeping on decentralized ledgers.

Natural Language Processing (NLP), speech recognition, computer vision, translation, and augmented reality, can be enabled with AI in the Metaverse. If we’re honest, a digital parallel universe to our analog world in which participants can take part in diverse social, economic, entertainment and artistic activities in a variety of self-organized groupings and environments, is some way from being realized. 

Now for YOUR thoughts:
How will you use it for your business or brand? 
Please comment, like or share below - I welcome your views!

#metaversenews #news #apple #applenews #msft #harvardbusinessreview #marketing #web3 #technology #technews #socialmedia #digitalcontent #socialmediamarketing #socialcontent #wpp #publicis #groupm #technews #ceos #cmos #apple #publicis #groupm #cashmere #lucsasfilm #dapperlabs #vaynermedia #garyvee #gamers #epicgames #nike #kelloggs #att #tmobile #spectrum #mobilegames #aws #amazon #cloudinfrastructure #niantic #meta #sandbox #decentrland #degen #universalmusicgroup #musicindustry #musicbusiness #socialmedia #digitalcontent #microsoft

resharedPost.text:
We are pleased to announce that Yoteqi won the 1st prize after pitching during the POESAM (The Orange Social Venture Prize in Africa and the Middle East) organized by Orange at The Dot last week.

#Yoteqi #TheFutureOfNetworking #sustainability

data.text:
Super proud to announce that we won last week, the first prize after pitching during the POESAM organized by Orange at The Dot.

POESAM wasn't just a competition, it was a journey that i shared with 5 other amazing startups & friends, an amazing organizing team & top-notch mentors.

And behind every successful organization or competition, a woman dedicating all her time & energy to making POESAM a true success or even a LEGACY. Thank you Maya Jerbi for everything.

But wait, there's no Yoteqi without the team behind it that's why i  would like to dedicate this victory and thank the whole Yoteqi team for their hard work and commitment. They turned Yoteqi from an idea on a piece of paper to a viable product; transforming the way people network and engage with each other.
And I'm grateful to have an amazing mentor Jalel Ben Romdhane who was by my side for the last 12 months.

#Yoteqi #thefutureofnetworking #sustainability #POESAM2022
Jalel Ben Romdhane Nassef Otay Tabai Ala Eddin Ahmed Welhezi Zayneb Ben Aballah oussema hidri 1KUB, l'Incubateur

resharedPost.text:
VCs : make sure to respond to all Founders reaching out for capital.

LPs : make sure to respond to all GPs reaching out for capital.

A short « Thank you, but not for us. Good luck » is 10x better than ghosting.

Simple as that.

#vcs #fundraising #lps #respect #politeness #itsyourjob

Le team 1KUB, l'Incubateur vous propose une soirée #metaverse (Romdhan's verse).
Un format de 2 Heures pour un round up sur l'univers #Meta ponctué d'#exemples et #témoignages
Adaptées au distanciel, cette soirée vous permet à tous les non initiés d'appréhender le Metaverse à travers ses composantes avec un petit détour par l'économie.
Tout savoir sur cet #univers #virtuel qui attire les géants de la tech avec Jalel Ben Romdhane et Mohamed khedher.

▶#Comment:
1) Reservez vos billets ici: https://lnkd.in/enUVyK6q
2) Faites un don à l'association Man Nartaqi معا نرتقي ( à partir de 20dt) ici : https://lnkd.in/dSTt4NEu
▶#Date: Jeudi 14 avril de 20h à 22h
"Nous formons des professionnels. Nous aidons des familles."
#formation #communication #planning #travail #agilite #collaboration #actionsolidaire #ramadan2022 #thinkagiletn #mannartaqi

resharedPost.text:
Hi network, since I'm actively looking for a job herr in Dubai, I would like some help.

So let me introduce myself in few lines. my name is Aymen Selmi, I'm 3d generalist and I'm passionate about what I do and new to UAE.
I worked on my type of project, from VFX, video games to Virtual Production, modeling & texturing, procedural workflow, rendering, to image composition and storyboarding, 
Product visualization, Advertising, Animations, Realtime Virtual Tour.

With little help from you, by spreading this post with your network, I hope I can finally start my journey. 

Please help me by a Liking & Sharing, I would be eternally grateful to everyone.

God bless you all 🙏

 #vfx #videogames #help #uae #network #job #dubai #activelylooking #jobs #opportunity #career #3dartist #3dsmax #vrayrender

data.text: If anyone is looking for a kickass 3D artist in Dubai or Remote Aymen is your man!

resharedPost.text:
In times like this, being confined at home is not easy, but you still want to go out and see the outside world, and then you are responsible so you just sit tight. But still there is a solution,  you might wonder how ? well the answer is easy, just grab your #VR set if you have one, a google cardboard or actually just your phone,  get up from your seat and look around, you'll feel #immersed, but there is a catch, you've actually never left your house. It is amazing how technology can be a relief sometimes.

Discover the world with #VR and don't let a virus ruin your in house travels. 

Attending a speed course on VR in journalism with the Deutsche Welle Akademi, where we went to the south of Tunisia and took magnificent 360° photos and videos, and I can say, I was thankful and happy to have had such an opportunity.  

My words will never do it justice, so check out the link below and you'll know what I am talking about. 

#virtualreality #xr #immersive #vrtraining  #immersivetechnology

We are currently working on an AR project featuring a basketball mini-game where a player can position a backboard wherever he wishes in the real world and try to score.
This is our first demo test of the game, more features will be added soon. #AR #ARKIT #AUGMENTEDREALITY #COMPUTERVISION  Mohamed khedher
